skills.name: Illusory Torrent
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character" while Mona is your active character:</color> This switch is considered a $[K2] instead of a $[K1]. (Once per Round)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character" while Mona is your active character:</color> This switch is considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>. (Once per Round)
skills.description: (Passive) When you perform "Switch Character" while Mona is your active character: This switch is considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. (Once per Round)
